pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simulating Survival Data from Change-Point Hazard Distributions // Simulates time-to-event data with type I right censoring using two methods: the inverse CDF method and our proposed memoryless method. The latter method takes advantage of the memoryless property of survival and simulates a separate distribution between change-points. We include two parametric distributions: exponential and Weibull. Inverse CDF method draws on the work of Rainer Walke (2010), https://www.demogr.mp g.de/papers/technicalreports/tr-2010-003.pdf.
